name: Toblerone Hunter
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

Space bar to shoot

Mouse to aim

Thank you for checking out my page!

My game is a top down shooter game, where you have to find the forbidden toblerone, zombies will spawn to try stop you for finding it, you will get a score of depending on the number of zombies you kill and the time you find the toblerone page.

The maze can generate a total of 456,976 different levels, The game also allows for custom made levels and if you want to make one please read the Readme file as it will explain how it works.

But yeah thanks for coming to the page and possibly downloading <3
